Texts.Chs:
高适应性，高敏捷，这种曾经的四足宝可梦以进化能力为代价变得更接近人类。然而，他们通过发明专门的设备来弥补这一点。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;：
能量 x^green;1.15^reset;，+^green;20^reset;% 移速 & 跳跃高度
^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;5^reset;%射线抗性，+^green;15^reset;%辐射抗性
^cyan;免疫^reset;: 辐射

^orange;环境^reset;：
葱郁/森林/丛林生态：+^green;15^reset;% 移速 & 跳跃高度
炎热生态：+^green;15^reset;%火炎抗性，-^red;15^reset;%寒气抗性
寒冷生态：+^green;15^reset;%寒气抗性，-^red;15^reset;%火炎抗性

^orange;武器^reset;：
阔剑/短剑/矛/短矛/镰刀/刺剑/匕首：伤害x^green;1.15^reset;
手枪/自动手枪/霰弹枪/弓/回旋镖/悠悠球：伤害x^red;0.95^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;：
防御x^red;0.95^reset;
^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;5^reset;%物理抗性，-^red;5^reset;% Poison,毒素抗性，-^red;5^reset;%暗影抗性
Texts.Eng:
Through natural evolution, these former quadrupeds gained more human characteristics, at the cost of their transformative abilities. Though they have accomodated for this with special armor.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Energy x^green;1.15^reset;, +20% Speed & Jump
  ^green;Resist^reset;: ^green;5^reset;% Cosmic, ^green;15^reset;% Radiation
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Radiation

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Lush, Forest, and Jungle: +^green;15^reset;% Speed & Jump
  Hot biomes: +^green;10% Fire Resist^reset; / -^red;10% Ice Resist^reset;
  Cold biomes: +^green;10% Ice Resist^reset; / -^red;10% Fire Resist^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Broadsword, Shortsword, Spear, Shortspear, Scythe, Rapier, Dagger: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;
  Pistol, Machine Pistol, Shotgun, Bow, Boomerang, Yoyo: Damage x^red;0.95^reset;
  Perfect Block: Gain increasing Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Defense x^red;0.95^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;5^reset;% Physical, -^red;5^reset;% Poison, -^red;5^reset;% Shadow
